pullrequest.title: Correct the calculation of AABB transformations and give frame semantics to AABB types

content.raw:
One option to consider: Right now the default frame for `shape->GetAxisAlignedBoundingBox()` is the world frame. We could make that default to the shape's local frame instead so that users would call `shape->GetAxisAlignedBoundingBox(FrameID::World())` if they want the result to be in the world frame.

I’m fine with either way, but I thought I’d put that out there for discussion.
